name: Rennes
fun_fact: Fun fact: Rennes is the heart of Brittany's cider production - 84% of Brittany's cider (which represents 40% of all cider consumed in France) comes from within 60km of the city. The rivalry between Brittany and Normandy over who invented cider and who makes the best is legendary.
